item.description:
We are holding another End the Fed Rally at the Boston Federal Reserve this Sunday, Nov 22 at 10 am.

We need your help spreading the word. There will be speakers speaking at noon and then we will march to Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market (about 15 min walk) to interact with the public.

There will be a meeting Tuesday with MassLPA.org organization to work on details.
Where: Endicott Estate 656 East Street, Dedham, MA 02026
When: November 17th 7:00 â€“ 9:30

Also Wednesday evening there will be a teleconfrence:
7 PM 1-605-990-0015 access code 771-858-638

There is also a FaceBook Group
http://www.facebook.c...

I hope to see you Sunday. Bring signs and friends.

If you have any questions, give me a call and I'll try to get them answered.
Stephen Ayer 781-572-9750

Visit ETF-Boston at:
http://www.restorethe...
item.name: Audit the Fed Boston Rally!
